lines.i: This class represents a question that requires an answer based on a predefined terminology/value set.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] question
This attribute is used to define the code associated with the Behavioral Health assessment question that requires a coded response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] answer with data type Code
This attribute represents response as a coded value to a specific assessment question. If a response is not provided, then the null value may be qualified by a ASKU (asked but unknown) null flavor.

Contains exactly one [1..1] question
This attribute is used to define the code associated with the Behavioral Health assessment question that requires a coded response.

Contains zero or more [0..*] answer with data type Code
This attribute represents response as a coded value to a specific assessment question. If a response is not provided, then the null value may be qualified by a ASKU (asked but unknown) null flavor.
